channel.title: Emotion list teleports?
channel.description:
Hey guys, you no your emotion liat where it ses stuff like "dance" or "cry"
Well how do you change so it has "home" on it and when you click it it teleports you to home, same with "train" etc...
Thanks in advance, johno

item.title: Emotion list teleports?
item.dc:creator: @roberini roberini
item.description:
@roberini wrote:

I can tell you that.

You know how to put text on that tabs?

If you don’t, ask me.

But first, you have to open your client. Look for case 168. Replace all of the case(including the break) with this.

case 168:
if(teleblock == true){
sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); 
}
else
{
customCommand("home");
}
break;

I’ll explain all the lines.

case 168:

That means you start a case for the tabb 168(the first tab)

if(teleblock == true){ 
sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting.");

It means when your teleblocked, It will send a message you can’t tele

customCommand("home"); 
break;

This will add the command to it. So if you would click on the tab, you will activate the command Home.
And the break; part is just to add a break so it wouldn’t continue all over again.

Read full topic

item.title: Emotion list teleports?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Don’t do that, keep all teleports on Magic interface seriously.

Read full topic
